text:
e="preserve">Hukum Singh (5 April 1938 – 3 February 2018) was an Indian politician. He served as the Member of Parliament from Kairana in Uttar Pradesh. He was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He was a member of the Panel of Chairpersons of the 16th Lok Sabha, and the Chairperson of the Standing Committee on Water Resources. He was born in Kairana, Uttar Pradesh.
Singh died of respiratory arrest in Noida, Uttar Pradesh on 3 February 2018 at the age of 79.
